ModMetaData.name: Stackable Chunks
ModMetaData.author: EarthyTurtle, zhrocks
ModMetaData.description:
Mod Version [1.2.6] Supports Rimworld Versions 1.0, 1.1 and Royalty
A small, simple mod that makes chunks stackable instead of singular.
'Stackable Chunks' is under the creative commons license. Cite, learn and use aspects from this mod, credit optional but appreciated ;). Please do not outright copy this mod and/or re-upload without my consent. Credits to: - zhrocks for creating the ongoing 1.1 support!
